how.title: How it Works
how.1: Pick a currency pair and enter the amount to send
how.1desc: Choose from hundreds of coins and exchange any amount without upper limits
how.2: Indicate your receiving address for the selected coin
how.2desc: Add a destination tag (memo, message, etc) if required
how.3: Enter and apply a promo code if you have one
how.3desc: Your bonus will be added to the total amount and displayed in the “You get” field
how.4: Select a fixed or floating rate and click “Let’s Exchange”
how.4desc: A fixed rate excludes slippage for 30 minutes, a floating rate may fluctuate.
how.5: Check and confirm the exchange details
how.5desc: If all the details are correct, click “Accept”
how.6: Send the exact exchange amount to the deposit address
how.6desc: You can scan the QR code or copy the address. Make sure to add a destination tag if required.
how.7: Wait for the exchange to go through
how.7desc: Click “Notify me” to get an email notification when the exchange is completed
how.8desc: Request a receipt if needed; you can also sign up to track your exchange history
how.9desc: Everything’s ready for your easy and secure crypto exchange

aboutus.mainDesc: LetsExchange is a one-stop multicurrency exchange service free of registration, limits, and complications. Built by a team of crypto visionaries with 10+ years of experience in the blockchain space and fintech, LetsExchange saves your time at each step of a crypto swap and amplifies your trading revenue.
aboutus.1desc: No registration is required, so that you can start trading in no time, as soon as the rate is right for you.
aboutus.2desc: An intuitive interface with an all-in-one exchange widget is designed for swift and effortless crypto swaps. Just pick a currency pair, enter the amount and your wallet address, then click “Exchange”.
aboutus.3: Get it done in a flash
aboutus.3desc: With a streamlined, fully automated exchange process, transactions only take an instant on LetsExchange. The exchange processing time solely depends on the network speed of the selected coins.
aboutus.4: Get the most out of each trade
aboutus.4desc: Our SmartRate technology cherry-picks the most profitable rate across multiple major exchange platforms for every swap.
aboutus.5desc: Choose from 3530+ coins and 12418600+ currency pairs without any transaction restrictions applied by LetsExchange.
aboutus.6: Fix the rates or let them float
aboutus.6desc: Select the Fixed Rates option to get the exact amount you see before starting a trade or stick to the classic exchange flow with floating rates.
aboutus.7desc: We don’t store your funds and personal data. All featured coins are validated and double-checked. The platform’s security is enhanced by encryption, an SSL certificate, and DDoS protection.
aboutus.8desc: The exchange process is clear and transparent, and you can request a receipt with full transaction details.
aboutus.9desc: In case of any questions, our support team is here to help 24/7.
